platforms.name: LearnWeb3
platforms.description: Become a Web3 Developer for free! Lead the charge to new frontiers Become a next-gen developer Learn to harness next-gen technologies to build the bridges

platforms.name: Alchemy University
platforms.description: Alchemy University is the ultimate ecosystem for learning how to build and interact with web3. Our goal is to teach you everything you need to know.

platforms.name: CryptoZombies
platforms.description: CryptoZombies is an interactive school that teaches you all things technical about blockchains. Learn to make smart contracts in Solidity or Libra by making your own crypto-collectibles game.
